channel.title: In need of a cape tutorial
channel.description:
I'm looking to find out how to make a skillcape appear in your inventory when you get a 99 stat. If you know of a tutorial, or would be willing to teach me i would appreciate it.
Thanks

item.title: In need of a cape tutorial
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

look for the level up boolean and add
if(playerLevel == 99){
addItem(ID, 1);
}

Read full topic
item.source: In need of a cape tutorial
